content: ***a gorgeously textured beanie for the chilly days *** this is a quite simple beanie with a beautiful stitch combination which creates a nice and warm headwear to keep your head warm during the cold winter and windy spring days i used this stitch combination in my ** rembina twisted headband 1 ** and i thought you would love a beanie option too the pattern is **free on my blog here 2 ** or if you click on visit pattern website above also you can dowload an ad free pdf version from my ravelry store for a small fee **special thanks to my testers ** *cheryl freeman ágnes viktória szücs rebecca urrutia* **difficulty ** intermediate **finished size ** child teen/adult small/adult large *note these are approximate measurements and keep in mind that the beanie stretches when worn * **materials needed ** 5 mm h size hook * i used limited edition cherry+purple swirl alpha by furls * 85/90/105 grams 142/150/175 yards/130/137/160 metres of aran/worsted weight yarn * i used red heart super saver in retro stripe shade * yarn needle for weaving in ends scissors stitch markers * optional * faux fur pompom * optional * **us terms** used throughout it is available to download as a photo tutorial and it has a print friendly version too also there are several links to my **support videos on youtube** to show you how to make some specific stitches **no chart/diagram available ** i hope you ll love it as much as i loved creating it ***happy crocheting *** *krisztina* 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/rembina-twisted-headband 2 https //kamecrochet com/2023/03/01/rembina-beanie/
